name: GeneralOrNeuraxialAnesthesia
title: General Or Neuraxial Anesthesia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of procedures to identify patients who have a surgical procedure where a general and/or neuraxial anesthesia is used.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for general and/or neuraxial anesthesia.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
